item.title: Notion 2.48: Set up Notion in one click, Calendar updates, and more
item.description:
Let AI help you build

Create custom setups instantly with AI! Describe what you need (you can be as detailed as you‚Äôd like), and AI will build your use case. This is a huge timesaver. Just type /database and select Build with AI.

Workflows in one click

We made a bunch of pre-built setups for you, like Task Trackers, Meeting Notes, and Brainstorm Sessions. They're easy to customize, too. Just create a new page, click database, and select More templates.

Do more with recurring tasks

Automatically update pages on a schedule with recurring database automations. Set and forget tasks like weekly reminders, or auto-generate weekly status docs for projects marked as In Progress.

See who has access to your doc üëÄ

We made it really obvious who has access to your doc (and what type of access they have) in the Share menu so you never get a ‚Äúneed access‚Äù note again.

Limit what form respondents see

Now you can restrict viewing privileges so others in your workspace only see their own submissions‚Äînot the entire database of responses!

More reasons to replace your scheduling app

You can now set an expiration date for your scheduling link and how far into the future people can schedule a meeting with you in Notion Calendar. Download Notion Calendar ‚Üí

More improvements to start the year!

  • If your automation has errors, we‚Äôll now show you helpful tips so you can fix it!

  • We added the ability to search your settings from the ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ menu.

  • When you make a form that allows respondents to select more than one answer to a question, you can now limit the number of options people can select.

  • In the Android app‚Äôs inbox, you can now swipe left or right to act on notifications.

  • When you make a button, you can now set it to insert a block at the top or bottom of your page.

item.title: 2.47: More automations, answers from GitHub, and easy Calendar scheduling
item.description:
Get answers from GitHub Beta

Now when you ask Notion AI questions, it will search GitHub (in addition to other sources like Slack and Google Drive) to find answers. This is a big shortcut for finding code, markdown files, pull requests, and more. Learn more ‚Üí

Automate 1,000+ workflows with webhook actions

We‚Äôve been working hard to ship webhooks and this is our first big step. Now you can connect your workflows with thousands of other tools through platforms like Zapier and Make. Try the new automations in a button or database, like triggering a post to publish on X (aka Twitter) or updating a contact in Hubspot. So many possibilities! Learn more ‚Üí

Press a button, send a notification

No more switching apps just to send a message to your team! Send a notification in Notion or a customized email from Gmail using a Notion button. Try it in your workflows to automatically notify coworkers when a bug report comes in, or email your manager when you‚Äôve finished an important task. Learn more ‚Üí

Easy scheduling with Notion Calendar

Another time-saver: Now when you Share availability in Notion Calendar, you can allow multiple people to book time with you, avoid conflicts, and handle reschedules‚Äîall without having to use a separate scheduling app. It‚Äôs super easy to add a scheduling link to your emails! Download Notion Calendar ‚Üí

Capture notes with new iOS shortcuts

It‚Äôs now easier than ever to capture a quick idea! We‚Äôve added four iOS shortcuts: create a page, search in Notion, add text to a page, or open a specific doc. Set them up by using the Shortcuts app on your iPhone. Download Notion on iOS ‚Üí

Because details matter

  • Color Picker: We redesigned the color picker so you know exactly what element you‚Äôre changing.

  • Rounded Corner: We smoothed the corners of checkboxes in a database, ahh!

  • Happy Birthday: Try the Birthday event type in Notion Calendar. It automatically repeats every year so you never forget!

  • HIPAA AI upgrade: Did you know Notion AI is HIPAA compliant? And now HIPAA customers can analyze PDFs using Notion AI.

  • Monday.com importer Beta: Now you can import any kind of board from Monday.com. Select specific boards you want to bring into Notion or choose to migrate everything at once. Try the new importer ‚Üí

item.title: Notion 2.46: Forms, Mail, layouts, new automations, and more!
item.description:
Watch the recap

Uh-oh! It looks like your ad blocker is preventing the video from playing.

Introducing forms, right inside Notion!

Forms give you an easy way to capture requests, feedback, RSVPs, or anything you need right where you work. Responses are stored in a Notion database, where you can keep everything organized, visualize the input as a chart, or turn feedback into tasks. No need for an outside tool! You get unlimited forms for free. Try one out ‚Üí

Notion Mail (coming soon!)

Email hasn‚Äôt changed in 20 years. It's cluttered, chaotic, and hard to manage. So we rebuilt it! Notion Mail is fast, minimal, and does all the organizing and back-and-forth of scheduling for you! Best part is ‚Äúviews‚Äù that let you customize your inbox to your workflows, just like the rest of Notion. We can‚Äôt wait for you to try the preview and hear how it changes the way you work. Join the waitlist!

Layouts to customize your page

The way you and your team work is unique and your tools should be flexible enough to match! So we created a way for you to layout your tasks, goals, documents, or whatever you keep in Notion. Your newly organized, beautiful pages will help keep teams focused and efficient. Try it out by hovering over any database page title and clicking Customize layout.

Automations can now send emails

Now you can use an automation to notify people via Gmail (one of your top requests!). Trigger an email when information changes, like when a form has been submitted or the status of a project changes. Soon you‚Äôll be able to send custom web requests to platforms like Zapier and Make to trigger actions in other apps, too.

Automate more actions with formulas

This is a true superpower. Database and button automations now support formulas that can complete steps in the background when you trigger an action‚Äîa huge time saver. For example, when you mark a task done, you can automatically show how little time it took to complete. Dig in to learn more ‚Üí

Introducing the new Marketplace

Have you created an amazing setup or workflow? We‚Äôve made it easier than ever to list and sell your template. Native payments, analytics, reviews and ratings, safeguards to prevent unfair re-distribution‚Äîall in the best place for millions of users to discover your work! Whether you‚Äôre looking for the perfect template or starting a business‚Äîthere are creators who make seven figures on Notion!‚Äîthis is the place. Go to Notion Marketplace ‚Üí

Custom emojis!

Maybe the best update ever? You can now upload your own emojis! Use them in your page titles or anywhere‚Äîjust type /emoji or : followed by its name.

Personalize your URLs

Notion Site URLs often have a long string of numbers and characters, but now you can make them exactly what you‚Äôd like! Cory, our video producer and resident birder, turned his site birdingnyc.com/NYC-Birding-Checklist-3ebf732864 into birdingnyc.com/mybirds. Just use the Share ‚Üí Publish menu. Learn more ‚Üí

Shortcut to Notion features

When searching, type in a keyword like ‚ÄúHome,‚Äù ‚ÄúSettings,‚Äù or ‚ÄúTemplates‚Äù to jump to specific places in Notion. Try it with the ‚åò P keyboard shortcut. It‚Äôs a small thing that can make you much faster!

A few more improvements

  • Load database info 15% faster. Even with all these new features, performance is still our top priority.

  • Now your page titles, database views, and database pages are aligned (check it out). Sometimes the smallest design details matter most!

item.title: Notion 2.45: Meet the new Notion AI
item.description:
New AI connectors BETA: Google Docs, Sheets, & Slides

Now when you ask Notion AI a question, it can search across your trusted knowledge sources to find the answer‚Äîfrom Slack conversations lost in the stream to Google Slides you forgot existed. GitHub, Jira, and more are coming soon! Learn more ‚Üí

Generate & edit docs in your own style

It‚Äôs like having a staff of editors and writers. Now when you ask Notion AI to generate or edit your writing, you can guide the response with an @mention of any page, such as a style guide, project update, or batch of user feedback. No more generic responses! Learn more ‚Üí

Analyze PDFs & images

Now Notion AI can pull insights from a lengthy PDF, recommend a workback plan based on a proposal, or explain any uploaded image. Just click the üìé icon! Learn more ‚Üí

Chat about anything

Notion AI has access to cutting-edge language models like GPT-4 and Claude, so you can (privately!) ask it about any topic. And it‚Äôs easy to add the response into your page‚Äîno need to copy/paste from a separate tab. Learn more ‚Üí

Helps with questions about Notion

Notion does a lot, and now Notion AI can help you get even more from your workspace. Rather than search our help doc, watch YouTube videos, or bug a teammate, just ask Notion AI a question or select Notion Help Center from the source menu.

Suggests how it can help

When you highlight text, Notion AI suggests relevant ways to help. It may offer to Explain the text or help you Improve Writing. One click and you get what you need‚Äîno prompting. Teams have reported a major uptick in the value of Notion AI with this new, easy-to-use design!

item.title: Notion 2.44: Introducing charts + a sneak peek at forms
item.description:
Create a chart in seconds

Turn any database into a chart in one click! Charts help you and your team track projects, goals, sales, or any info you keep in Notion. Try them for free‚Äîand if you love them, create unlimited charts on any paid plan.

Place charts on any page

It‚Äôs easy to add charts to any Notion page or database. Just type /chart and pick your source. When the source data changes, your chart will update automatically. No more pasting screenshots that quickly fall out of date.

Use multiple charts to track everything

Nobody likes flipping between apps to stay on top of projects. Now you don‚Äôt have to: you can add multiple charts on a page, then click and drag them anywhere to make a custom layout. And embed analytics from other tools like Tableau and Amplitude to create your dream dashboard!

Customize your charts

Choose from bar, line, or pie charts and change color palettes, axis names, data labels, and more. Charts should be as beautiful as they are useful!

Smarter, more flexible automations

Automations got a big upgrade. You can now specify more than one condition to trigger an action‚Äîfor example, when a task is marked ‚Äúoverdue‚Äù and ‚Äúhigh-priority‚Äù, automatically notify the team. Or set them to run only when a specific value is met, like when an issue is marked "at risk‚Äù. Plus, automations can do new things, like adding or removing people assigned to a project. Learn more ‚Üí

Next up, Forms! Coming Soon

You‚Äôve been asking for this feature, and we listened. You‚Äôll now be able to request feedback, post surveys, and collect RSVPs or whatever info you need. All responses will automatically populate your Notion database‚Äîno more logging results manually. We‚Äôll start opening access in the coming weeks! üòÑ

More new features

  • Coming soon Chart drilldown: Soon you'll be able to click on any data point to review its underlying pages.

  • Add comments on database properties: Ping a colleague or add a note to any database property.

  • Get a sneak peek of desktop tabs: When your cursor hovers over a tab in the desktop app, you‚Äôll see a preview of that tab‚Äôs content.

  • Add links to images: Now you can direct any image to a specific page or URL.

item.title: Notion 2.43: Suggested edits + new Notion AI features
item.description:
Suggested edits

Collaborating on docs used to be a pain, so we made it much easier to track changes! Now any collaborator can make suggestions, and you or a teammate can quickly accept or reject.

A better Inbox

It can be hard to keep track of all the activity happening in your workspace. So we‚Äôve grouped suggested edits and comments into easy-to-read threads. And as you jump from page to page to resolve comments, your new Inbox stays open to keep you focused.

One-click AI skills (no prompt required)

Using AI can feel hard‚Äîunless you know how to write a perfect prompt from scratch. These one-click skills make it much easier! Brainstorm ideas, make a diagram, summarize notes, or translate content‚Äîall with one click.

One AI tool to chat & search

Notion AI can answer any question! It finds the right info from Notion, Slack (soon Google Drive & Github too), and models like GPT-4. No need to search a bunch of tools. And with a full-page window, you have a distraction-free place to chat.
